topic: List of Executive Officials, Deans, and Service Directors
content:
Under the EARIST Organizational Structure, the following individuals serve as Executive Officials, Deans, and Directors of various services. The University Telephone Trunk Line is (028) 243 9437. The Office of the President is led by Dr. Rogelio T. Mamaradlo, who serves as the President and the Interim Dean of the College of Engineering. His contact details are rmamaradlo@earist.edu.ph (Local 101). The Executive Vice President and OIC-Dean of the Graduate School is Dr. Allan Q. Quismundo (aqquismundo@earist.edu.ph, Local 101). The Vice President for Academic Affairs is Dr. Eric C. Mendoza (ecmendoza@earist.edu.ph, Local 131).

The Administration and Finance division is headed by Dr. Yolanda A. Lara, Vice President for Administration and Finance and Director of Financial Management Services (yalara@earist.edu.ph, Local 118). The College & Board Secretary is Ms. Gilda S. Familara (gsfamilara@earist.edu.ph, Local 125).

The Academic Deans leading the various colleges include: Ar. Diane A. Jose, Dean of the College of Architecture and Fine Arts (dajose@earist.edu.ph, Local 107); Mrs. Rodora T. Oliveros, Dean of the College of Arts & Sciences (rtoliveros@earist.edu.ph, Local 108); Dr. Willy O. Gapasin, Dean of the College of Business and Public Administration (wogapasin@earist.edu.ph, Local 109); Dr. Jesus S. Paguigan, Dean of the College of Computing Studies (jspaguigan@earist.edu.ph, Local 151); Dr. Anabel D. Riva, Dean of the College of Criminal Justice (adriva@earist.edu.ph, Local 114); Dr. Evangeline M. Sangalang, Dean of the College of Education (emsangalang@earist.edu.ph, Local 110); Dr. Maria Rhoda D. Ordovez, Dean of the College of Industrial Technology (epordovez@earist.edu.ph, Local 113). The EARIST Cavite Campus is managed by Administrator Dr. Agnes N. Coo (ancoo@earist.edu.ph, Local 101).
